mutants.code:
def calculate_friendliness(arr, N):
    arr.sort()
    s = 0
    for index in range(1, N - 1):
        one = abs(arr[index] - arr[index + 1])
        two = abs(arr[index] - arr[index - 1])
        s += min(one, two)
    s -= abs(arr[-1] - arr[-2])
    s += abs(arr[1] - arr[0])
    return s

    arr.sort()
